text: I have tried so many times to go from
Calais to the UK this is my 18th attempt
we knew this tanker was going to the UK
it's filled with hot liquid chocolate it
is known that these kinds of tankers
don't get x-rayed and they go directly
to the Channel Tunnel and the train to
the UK we are all hoping for a better
life in the UK the tank is deep the
trafficker divides us into groups and
chooses the 7 tallest people I am one of
them the lid at the top of the tanker
has two hatches and they're locked with
wires
I am totally covered in chocolate up to
a few centimeters under my neck it's a
strange feeling at first it's nice as it
keeps us warm
but soon it becomes very uncomfortable
it is difficult to breathe and we're
getting hotter and hotter we try and
bear it we know as soon as the tanker
moves we only have 20 to 30 minutes
before it reaches the Train and we can
get out and claim asylum but the tanker
doesn't move we stayed there for over
two hours if anyone becomes submerged by
the hot chocolate he would have drowned
the heat was terrible some of the others
were crying
we eventually all agreed to leave but
the chocolate is so sticky and heavy it
is very hard to get out we can't get the
last person out there is no one left to
push him out the chocolate is sucking
him down
we pulled harder and harder and he comes
free but his shoes were left behind
we're all covered in chocolate hair eyes
hands everywhere we decide to walk back
to our tents in the woods you can see
our chocolate footprints for 300 meters
